title: Devil.May.Cry.4.Special.Edition.DLC.Unlocker-CODEX
description:
C O D E X
P R E S E N T S

Devil May Cry 4: Special Edition - DLC Unlocker
Release Date: 06/2015 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: Action

This unlocks the following DLCs:

1 Blue Orb
2 Blue Orbs
5 Blue Orbs
Lady & Trish Costumes
Proud Souls (200,000)
Red Orbs (300,000)
S.Nero/Dante/Vergil
Unlock All Modes

Extract
Copy to installdir
Play

This unlocker requires: Devil.May.Cry.4.Special.Edition-CODEX

General Notes:

Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
trying to go online
If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
to run this game with admin privileges instead
